messages.message:
Hi Team,
When I am going through the formula list in refiner, If I search for any of these special characters in the search bar `(` `)` `+`  `*` `?` , it is redirecting to a blank page. I have also inspected and it is showing syntax error.

cc : @Nithin

we are generally not making fixes for the enterprise platform

are you able to work around this by using ctrl/cmd + f in the browser?

Yes, I tried that but ctrl/cmd + f is not working in this Formula list page but I observed that it is getting searched in the document text which we uploaded when we close the formula list page.

This issue might not be important but just wanted to discuss this.
ah i see, that makes sense :disappointed:
